mazesolver.logic

Class Astar

  • java.lang.Object
    • mazesolver.logic.Astar

  • public class Astar
extends Object
    This class provides implementation for A-Star pathfinding algorithm. It gets the maze in which we are looking for a path as a parameter.
    Author:
    Marko Vainio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Astar(Maze maze)
      Constructor for A-Star pathfinding algorithm.

      MyArrayList<Node> findPossibleNeighbours(int x, int y)
      Determines all possible neighbours for a node in the grid i.e nodes which arent walls.
      void findShortestPath()
      Extracts the shortest path from the class' path array and marks it in the grid.
      int getDistance(int x, int y) 
      MyArrayList<Node> getShortestPath() 
      MyQueue<Node> getVisitedNodes() 
      void solve()
      Goes through nodes in the grid in order to find the shortest path.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Astar

        public Astar(Maze maze)
        Constructor for A-Star pathfinding algorithm.
        Parameters:
        maze - Maze in which we aare looking for a path.

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public void solve()
        Goes through nodes in the grid in order to find the shortest path. Nodes are put in a priority queue when found and the best candidate is looked at any given time.

      • findShortestPath

        public void findShortestPath()
        Extracts the shortest path from the class' path array and marks it in the grid.

      • getShortestPath

        public MyArrayList<Node> getShortestPath()

      • getVisitedNodes

        public MyQueue<Node> getVisitedNodes()

      • getDistance

        public int getDistance(int x,
                       int y)

      • findPossibleNeighbours

        public MyArrayList<Node> findPossibleNeighbours(int x,
                                                int y)
        Determines all possible neighbours for a node in the grid i.e nodes which arent walls.
        Parameters:
        x - Current x-coordinate.
        y - Current x-coordinate.
        Returns:
        Array of neighbour nodes.
